card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.

card.name: Tuktuk the Explorer
card.property: Haste When Tuktuk the Explorer dies, create Tuktuk the Returned, a legendary 5/5 colorless Goblin Golem artifact creature token.

card.name: Valakut Fireboar
card.property: Whenever Valakut Fireboar attacks, switch its power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Vent Sentinel
card.property: Defender {1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures you control with defender.

card.name: World at War
card.property: After the second main phase this turn, there's an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures that attacked this turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Wrap in Flames
card.property: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.

card.name: Ancient Stirrings
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Aura Gnarlid
card.property: Creatures with power less than Aura Gnarlid's power can't block it. Aura Gnarlid gets +1/+1 for each Aura on the battlefield.

card.name: Awakening Zone
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

card.name: Bear Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, untap all lands you control." Umbra armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Beastbreaker of Bala Ged
card.property: Level up {2}{G} ({2}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 4/4 LEVEL 4+ 6/6 Trample

card.name: Boar Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. Umbra armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Bramblesnap
card.property: Trample Tap an untapped creature you control: Bramblesnap gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Broodwarden
card.property: Eldrazi Spawn creatures you control get +2/+1.

card.name: Daggerback Basilisk
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Gelatinous Genesis
card.property: Create X X/X green Ooze creature tokens.

card.name: Gigantomancer
card.property: {1}: Target creature you control has base power and toughness 7/7 until end of turn.

card.name: Gravity Well
card.property: Whenever a creature with flying attacks, it loses flying until end of turn.

card.name: Growth Spasm
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

card.name: Haze Frog
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Haze Frog enters, prevent all combat damage that other creatures would deal this turn.

card.name: Irresistible Prey
card.property: Target creature must be blocked this turn if able. Draw a card.

card.name: Jaddi Lifestrider
card.property: When Jaddi Lifestrider enters, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 2 life for each creature tapped this way.

card.name: Joraga Treespeaker
card.property: Level up {1}{G} ({1}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 1/2 {T}: Add {G}{G}. LEVEL 5+ 1/4 Elves you control have "{T}: Add {G}{G}."

card.name: Kazandu Tuskcaller
card.property: Level up {1}{G} ({1}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-5 1/1 {T}: Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token. LEVEL 6+ 1/1 {T}: Create two 3/3 green Elephant creature tokens.

card.name: Khalni Hydra
card.property: This spell costs {G} less to cast for each green creature you control. Trample

card.name: Kozilek's Predator
card.property: When Kozilek's Predator enters, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

card.name: Leaf Arrow
card.property: Leaf Arrow deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.

card.name: Living Destiny
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand. You gain life equal to the revealed card's mana value.

card.name: Might of the Masses
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.

card.name: Momentous Fall
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. You draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then you gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Mul Daya Channelers
card.property: Play with the top card of your library revealed. As long as the top card of your library is a creature card, Mul Daya Channelers gets +3/+3. As long as the top card of your library is a land card, Mul Daya Channelers has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

card.name: Naturalize
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Nest Invader
card.property: When Nest Invader enters, create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

card.name: Ondu Giant
card.property: When Ondu Giant enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Overgrown Battlement
card.property: Defender {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control with defender.

card.name: Pelakka Wurm
card.property: Trample When Pelakka Wurm enters, you gain 7 life. When Pelakka Wurm dies, draw a card.

card.name: Prey's Vengeance
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Realms Uncharted
card.property: Search your library for up to four land cards with different names and reveal them. An opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Snake Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card." Umbra armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Spider Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.) Umbra armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.property: Reach

card.property: Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice permanents.

card.name: Wildheart Invoker

card.name: Sarkhan the Mad
card.property: 0: Reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. Sarkhan the Mad deals damage to himself equal to that card's mana value. −2: Target creature's controller sacrifices it, then that player creates a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying. −4: Each Dragon creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Angelheart Vial
card.property: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may put that many charge counters on Angelheart Vial. {2}, {T}, Remove four charge counters from Angelheart Vial: You gain 2 life and draw a card.

card.name: Enatu Golem
card.property: When Enatu Golem dies, you gain 4 life.

card.property: Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is its mana value. Equip {4}

card.name: Runed Servitor
card.property: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Sphinx-Bone Wand. If you do, Sphinx-Bone Wand deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to any target.

card.name: Warmonger's Chariot
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. As long as equipped creature has defender, it can attack as though it didn't have defender. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Eldrazi Temple
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast colorless Eldrazi spells or activate abilities of colorless Eldrazi.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
